Package model

Class Crack

java.lang.Object
model.Crack
public class Crack extends Object
This is Crack class which is used to define crack operations. SOLID principle: Crack class is separated from Brick class. Crack class is responsible for making crack on bricks whereas Brick class defines characteristic of bricks, so I think itâ€™s better to separate it to ensure single responsibility principle is adhered.

  • Constructor Details

    • Crack

      public Crack(Brick brick, int crackDepth, int steps)
      This is a constructor which initialises some variables in Crack class.
      Parameters:
      brick - brick object
      crackDepth - depth of crack
      steps - something like a step of staircase (which is later used to draw crack on brick)

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public GeneralPath draw()
      This method is to draw the crack on the brick.
      Returns:
      a geometric path constructed from straight line to form the crack

    • reset

      public void reset()
      This method is to reset the path to empty. The appended position is set back to the beginning of the path and all coordinates and point types are forgotten. There will be no more crack on the brick.

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack(Point2D point, int direction)
      This method is to define starting point and ending point on where the crack shall be started drawing from and ending at.
      Parameters:
      point - point of impact (point at which ball hits the brick)
      direction - direction of crack

    • makeCrack

      protected void makeCrack(Point start, Point end)
      This method is to define the path of the crack.
      Parameters:
      start - starting point of crack
      end - ending point of crack

    • randomInBounds

      private int randomInBounds(int bound)
      This method is to generate random value to change y-coordinate of the small crack inside the brick.
      Parameters:
      bound - a random fixed value to change the y-coordinate to make small crack
      Returns:
      random value that is used to change y-coordinate of the small crack inside the brick

    • makeRandomPoint

      private Point makeRandomPoint(Point from, Point to, int direction)
      This method is to make random ending point of crack depending on whether its direction is horizontal or vertical.
      Parameters:
      from - starting point of border of point
      to - ending point of border of point
      direction - direction to place the random generated ending point based on the starting point and ending point of border of brick given
      Returns:
      random generated ending point of crack
